channel.title: Block Ip Address
channel.description: How Do i Block Ip Address From Connection to my 508 server!!! and the ipban command is messed up!!!! it disconnects the person and it say no more connection may come from (ip address) but people that was banned is simply able to log back in! and i need anti Spamm Protection!

item.title: Block Ip Address

item.description:

No real ipbans work only z508s Ip Ban Is Legit, no other 508 server has that working.
